channel.title: Updates on Adar Kahiri
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on Adar Kahiri

item.title: July 2020
item.description: July 2020 Math stuff. I started learning topology. I’ve been reading Munkres’s book on the subject to learn about the fundamentals of point-set topology. I also started reading Hatcher’s book on algebraic topology as well as Pinter’s book on abstract algebra. My goal is to have a solid foundation in algebraic topology and algebra in a few months. I’ve been posting some solutions to problems I’ve done in Munkres’s book here.
